text: Nɨbɨlaŋ 1.13 Ais 57.20, Fl 3.19, 2 Pi 2.17 lusɨŋ sɨbɨlɨ mu mu vivi hɨsɨŋ kulaŋ uamalɨ. Lusɨŋ sɨbɨlɨ vihɨdavi agɨlaŋ avɨli hadi agaŋ minugulahɨdi me uamalɨ. Nɨbɨlaŋ lusɨŋ sɨbɨlɨ usi usi vihɨdavi uamalɨ. Lɨdɨŋ ma sɨkumakɨlahɨdavi uamalɨ. Lusɨŋ sɨbɨlɨ vihavɨdaci usi iakahɨdavi agɨlaŋ nɨbu avɨli hadi agadɨ sɨbusɨbu agɨlaŋ iakahɨdavi me uamalɨ. Nɨbɨlaŋ lidɨ hɨhɨle uaiaŋ susu hɨvɨ nulɨdɨ nuken hɨbɨ hɨvɨ ma hɨdahɨdavi me uamalɨ. Haman saja Asɨ agaŋ kɨlebɨla mu hɨsɨŋ hucɨŋ sɨbam agadɨ nulɨsaŋ sɨhuvɨci hɨnidi uamalɨ. Nɨbɨlaŋ kɨlebɨla hen u haman laci haman laci hɨnevɨdɨ uamalɨ.
